channel.title: Needing Richscape source help [ Should be easy ]
channel.description:
So.. 1 : When player log in hes automatic Member, i want he is not member at start..
2 : Yell channel only for members
3 : How make thiefing stalls work ? I tried like 10 different ways , but still not working..

item.title: Needing Richscape source help [ Should be easy ]

item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

  • Set the integer to 1 by default in the player class
  • Make it check if they are a member before it sends the message
  • They already work
